animals.name: Camel
animals.info: A camel is an even-toed ungulate in the genus Camelus that bears distinctive fatty deposits known as 'humps' on its back. Camels have long been domesticated and, as livestock, they provide food and textiles

animals.name: Tiger
animals.info: The tiger is the largest cat species, most recognizable for its pattern of dark vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside. The species is classified in the genus Panthera with the lion, jaguar, leopard, and snow leopard.
